wordGroup: abrasion resistance 耐磨性；抗磨损性
abrasion resistant 耐磨性，耐磨的
resistance to abrasion 磨蚀阻力
abrasion performance 耐磨性，耐磨耗性
surface abrasion 表面磨蚀，表面磨耗

sentences.en: Diamonds have extreme resistance to abrasion.
Because there is no abrasion between the concave and convex, the nut is reusable.
sentences.cn: 由于凹面与凸面之间没有磨损，螺母可以重复使用。

sentences.en: And they, too, had abrasion marks near these holes.
sentences.cn: 另外，它们同样在孔的附近有摩擦的痕迹。
